# cloudtemple_activity (Data Source)

To query this datasource you will need the `activity_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_activity" "foo" {
  id = "00791ba3-8cc0-4051-a654-9cd4d71eb48c"
}
```
